subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: For Game 2, Tony La Russa switched three positions in the Cardinals’ lineup, using Scott Spiezio as the designated hitter, Preston Wilson in left field and Aaron Miles at second base.
snippet: For Game 2, Tony La Russa switched three positions in the Cardinals’ lineup, using Scott Spiezio as the designated hitter, Preston Wilson in left field and Aaron Miles at second base.
